objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='backgroundGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#F2F2F2'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#E0E0E0'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#A0A0A0'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#C0C0C0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#backgroundGradient)'/><g transform='translate(540,540)'><circle r='320' fill='#E8E8E8' filter='drop-shadow(0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1))'/><circle r='220' fill='#F0F0F0' filter='drop-shadow(0px 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08))'/><circle r='120' fill='#F8F8F8' filter='drop-shadow(0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05))'/></g><g transform='translate(540,540)' opacity='0.1'><path d='M-320,0 A320,320 0 0,1 320,0' stroke='#A0A0A0' stroke-width='2' fill='none' transform='rotate(-20)'/><path d='M-220,0 A220,220 0 0,1 220,0' stroke='#A0A0A0' stroke-width='2' fill='none' transform='rotate(-20)'/><path d='M-120,0 A120,120 0 0,1 120,0' stroke='#A0A0A0' stroke-width='2' fill='none' transform='rotate(-20)'/></g><g transform='translate(1050,30)'><circle r='160' fill='#E8E8E8' filter='drop-shadow(0px 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1))'/><circle r='110' fill='#F0F0F0' filter='drop-shadow(0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08))'/><circle r='60' fill='#F8F8F8' filter='drop-shadow(0px 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05))'/></g><g transform='translate(30,1050)'><circle r='160' fill='#E8E8E8' filter='drop-shadow(0px 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1))'/><circle r='110' fill='#F0F0F0' filter='drop-shadow(0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08))'/><circle r='60' fill='#F8F8F8' filter='drop-shadow(0px 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05))'/></g><g opacity='0.4'><rect x='0' y='980' width='1080' height='100' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Active Noise Cancellation | Transparency Mode | Spatial Audio

product_details.description: BREATHTAKING AUDIO QUALITY — Apple-designed dynamic driver provides high-fidelity audio. Computational audio combines custom acoustic design with the Apple H1 chip and software for breakthrough listening experiences. FOCUS ON WHAT’S PLAYING — Active Noise Cancellation blocks outside noise so you can immerse yourself in music. HEAR THE WORLD AROUND YOU — Transparency mode lets you hear and interact with the world around you. PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO — With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Max deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you. You can also listen to select songs, shows, and movies in Dolby Atmos. ACOUSTIC-FIRST DESIGN — Designed with a knit-mesh canopy and memory foam ear cushions for an exceptional over-ear fit that perfectly seals in sound. MAGICAL EXPERIENCE — Pair AirPods Max by simply placing them near your device and tapping Connect on your screen. AirPods Max pause audio when you take them off. And Automatic Switching makes listening between your iPhone, iPad, and Mac completely effortless. LONG BATTERY LIFE — Up to 20 hours of listening, movie watching, or talk time with Active Noise Cancellation and Personalized Spatial Audio enabled. PRECISION CONTROL — Use the Digital Crown to play and pause music, to answer, end, and mute yourself on calls, and to control volume and skip between tracks. A SMARTER CASE — Store in an ultra low-power state with the slim Smart Case. LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See “Additional information” to learn more. Brand - Apple ** Color - Silver ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation **

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and modern product advertisement layout, centered around a premium pair of wireless over-ear headphones. The background employs a soft radial gradient with subtle concentric circles and geometric accents, offering a futuristic and clean aesthetic. Prominently placed at the center is the product image (`product_image`), which draws immediate attention.

The headline (`heading`) and subheading (`subheading`) appear at the top, using bold and stylish fonts to establish the product name and category. Additional information is provided in a smaller text block (`description`) beneath the image, highlighting product features.

The pricing (`price`) is boldly displayed, offering a strong value proposition, followed by a clear call to action (CTA) button made of a dark rectangular block (`cta_background`) with high-contrast text (`cta`) for visibility.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Grey: #F2F2F2
- Dark Grey: #333333
- Medium Grey: #555555
- Accent Gradient: #A0A0A0 to #C0C0C0
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image features a sleek, modern aesthetic with a minimalist and luxurious appeal. The primary color is a soft metallic silver (#C0C0C0) used for the ear cups, exhibiting a smooth gradient that adds depth and refinement. The ear cushions and headband interior are a crisp, textured white (#F5F5F5), enhancing cleanliness and contrast. Light gray tones (#D3D3D3) are subtly blended throughout, especially in the mesh and extended parts, maintaining cohesion while emphasizing the product’s sophistication. Chrome accents (#E0E0E0) in the joints add a high-end touch. This palette harmoniously balances cool metallics with neutral whites, perfect for a clean, tech-inspired banner.
